类 MemberControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • MemberControl
  • public class MemberControl
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a control class for Member class, which will manily implement login and register methods
    版本:
    1.3
    作者:
    Weng Huaiyuan,Gao Jingyun

      this methods decrease virtual stamps by 10 when is used for a free meal

      This method is used to generate membership number in order it reads the membership number of the last member in MemberInfo.txt and plus 1 to get the new membership number

      this methods decrease virtual stamps by 1 when a member pay for a noodle
      int login​(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String password)
      if id and password are both correct: return virtualStamp that is equal to 0 or more than 0 if id is correct and password is not correct: return virtualStamp = -11 if id and password are both not correct: return virtualStamp = -1

      used to check the email address

      this method gets the input from user then it records the member's information and generate a new membership number and return it.

        public java.lang.String getMembershipNumber​(Member member)

        返回:
        MembershipNumber the number of membership

        返回:

      • memberInfoRecord

        public void memberInfoRecord​(Member member)
        This method is used to record new member information into a file named MemberInfo.txt
        参数:
        member - a member object

      • generateMembershipNumber

        public java.lang.String generateMembershipNumber()
        This method is used to generate membership number in order it reads the membership number of the last member in MemberInfo.txt and plus 1 to get the new membership number
        返回:
        MembershipNumber

      • memberRegister

        public void memberRegister​(Member newMember)
        this method gets the input from user then it records the member's information and generate a new membership number and return it.
        参数:
        newMember - a new created member object

      • login

        public int login​(java.lang.String id,
                 java.lang.String password)
        if id and password are both correct: return virtualStamp that is equal to 0 or more than 0 if id is correct and password is not correct: return virtualStamp = -11 if id and password are both not correct: return virtualStamp = -1
        参数:
        id - the id number of the login member object
        password - the password number of the login member object
        返回:
        stampsNumber the stamp number of the member object or -1/-11 to represent failure status

      • decreaseVirtualStamp

        public int decreaseVirtualStamp​(java.lang.String givenname,
                                java.lang.String firstname)
        this methods decrease virtual stamps by 10 when is used for a free meal
        参数:
        givenname - the given name of the member object
        firstname - the first name of the member object
        返回:
        numberOfStamps the number of stamps of the member object

      • increaseVirtualStamp

        public int increaseVirtualStamp​(java.lang.String givenname,
                                java.lang.String firstname)
        this methods decrease virtual stamps by 1 when a member pay for a noodle
        参数:
        givenname - the given name of the member object
        firstname - the first name of the member object
        返回:
        numberOfStamps the number of stamps of the member object after increamentation

      • compareId

        public int compareId​(java.lang.String temp,
                     java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String password)
        search in the memberInfor.txt to find whether id and password match
        参数:
        temp - the compare object
        id - the id number of the member object
        password - the password of the member object
        返回:
        numberOfStamps the number of objects of member account

      • compare

        public int compare​(java.lang.String temp,
                   java.lang.String givenname,
                   java.lang.String firstname)
        search in the memberInfor.txt to find whether given name and first name match
        参数:
        temp - the compare object
        givenname - the givenname of the member object
        firstname - the firstname of the member object
        返回:
        numberOfStamps the number of objects of member account

        public java.lang.String getFirstname​(java.lang.String id)

        参数:
        id - the id number of the target member object
        返回:
        firstname firstname of the owner of the member object
